messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] What mede you interested in samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: Hmm. I have always been interested in the culture as a whole. Then I lived there for three years and trained and studied so thats my story. I am happy you
messages.messageBody:
Hmm. I have always been interested in the culture as a whole. Then I lived there for three years and trained and studied so thats my story. I am happy you where interested and if you would like to talk about arts I would be more than happy to talk with you.

shk_wd <sho-fal@...> wrote:
Hello,I am Sho.

What is prompt for you to come to interested in samurai?

I am very interested in samurai because since my childhood I have
seen samurai movie,which my father liked.And I live in Japan,so I
could often see samurai on TV. I took it for granted.But I wonder if
I lived out of Japan,how I think of samurai?

So I want to know how sumurai is reported out of Japan.And why
samurai fascinate many people?I will get some hints of it if I could
know your reason why you interested in samurai.

Thank you for your reading.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] What mede you interested in samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi i am Brad i have always been interested in japanese culture since i was  a kid and the martial arts. Right now i am currently studying aikijutsu/aikido i
messages.messageBody:
Hi i am Brad i have always been interested in japanese culture since i was a
kid and the martial arts. Right now i am currently studying aikijutsu/aikido
i will soon be taking kickboxing as well, i am also learning japanese i have
plans of visiting japan maybe even living there.I am interested in the
samurai for how they lived,trained,died,etiquette,honor.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Hello,I am Sho.

What is prompt for you to come to interested in samurai?

I am very interested in samurai because since my childhood I have
seen samurai movie,which my father liked.And I live in Japan,so I
could often see samurai on TV. I took it for granted.But I wonder if
I lived out of Japan,how I think of samurai?

So I want to know how sumurai is reported out of Japan.And why
samurai fascinate many people?I will get some hints of it if I could
know your reason why you interested in samurai.

Thank you for your reading.
